commands.command: aws ec2 run-instances --image-id  ami-29ebb519  --key-name  watshkeydev  --instance-type t2.micro --security-groups MySecurityGroup
aws ec2 stop-instances --instance-ids < aws ec2 describe-instances --query Reservations[0].Instances[0].InstanceId
aws ec2 start-instances --instance-ids < aws ec2 describe-instances --query Reservations[0].Instances[0].InstanceId
